open.title: Vuma Village outage | Senderwood, Marlboro, Germiston, Fourways, Rivonia
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Senderwood, Marlboro, Germiston, Fourways, Rivonia, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Vumatel technicians are still working on the fibre break.

Please note the following areas have been added to the outage. Clients will experience degraded performance.

*Marlboro
*Germiston
*Fourways
*Rivonia
*Surrounding Areas

open.title: Vuma Villages Outage | Gauteng
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Gauteng, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Afrihost and Vumatel are continuing to monitor. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
The impact has been mitigated and we continue to monitor for any further impacts. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
We detected another impact and are investigating.
We continue to monitor for stability.
Vumatel engineers are continuing to investigate the cause of the outages. We apologize for the issues experienced.
